title: Week Notes 028

summary: (Photo adapted from an official White House photo by Lawrence Jackson) This last week the billionaire owners of both the Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times prevented their newspaper editorial staffs from endorsing Kamala Harris for President of the United States.  The rationale given for these interventions are thin gruel indeed, and belie the […]
title: The Scalzi Endorsement: Kamala Harris for President

summary: Every time I've setup a server in the past decade the SSH keys have been set for me, most hosts I've used do this (DigitalOcean, Hetzner, etc).  This week I signed up for a server with Contabo and I had to do it myself, like a caveman.  Lewis was kind enough to help because he'd done the same thing mere days before me...
title: Copy SSH Keys to a Server
